nodes.text: The SRV-1 New Republic Scout and Retrieval Vehicle was a treaded vehicle used by the New Republic shortly after the Battle of Endor. It was driven by two soldiers, in addition to two useable turrets above the cockpit. It was capable of carrying up to eight soldiers, or three metric tons. The SRV-1 was later adapted into the Scout and Retrieval Vehicle/Repulsorlift, or SRV/R-1.
